Panel.headerText: Corporates and Agents:

Text.text: Welcome to the GST.AI! Whether you're representing a Consulate/Embassy, UN Body, Overseas Agent, or a Taxpayer in India, our registration process is simple and straightforward. Here are the FAQs on how to get started:

Panel.headerText: How do I create an account on the GST.AI?

Text.text: To create an account, click on the 'Register Now' link and choose the relevant category based on your customer type.

Panel.headerText: What are the categories listed on the GST.AI?

Text.text: GST.AI provides the following categories:
Taxpayer in India (Mandatory PAN in India)
Overseas Agent
UN Body

Panel.headerText: What are the prerequisite to select the category?

Text.text: You should have the following information in hand before registering on the GST.AI

Panel.headerText: What information should I provide during registration?

Text.text: The information varies based on your category. However, you may be asked to provide company identification information for e.g., the legal name, address etc., along with GSTINs, IATA code (mandatory for agents) and other user details.

Panel.headerText: Can I change my account category after completing the registration process?

Text.text: No, the account category needs to be selected initially and cannot be changed post-registration.

Panel.headerText: How is the information validated during submission?

Text.text: The system accepts data in all fields with necessary validations to ensure accuracy.

Panel.headerText: Can I provide multiple GSTIN details during registration?

Text.text: Yes, you can provide multiple valid GSTIN details during registration.

Panel.headerText: How do I select the default GSTIN from the list?

Text.text: The admin can select the default GSTIN from the list associated with the PAN used for registration. The default GSTIN is required only to create a personal experience for you when landing on the dashboard. You can modify it as per your choice from the profile section in your account.

Panel.headerText: What mandatory documents do I need to attach during registration?

Text.text: PAN is a mandatory document that is required to be uploaded if you fall in the category of Taxpayer in India.

Panel.headerText: What optional documents do I need to attach during registration?

Text.text: The optional documents include TAN, ARN, company's address, contact details, and LUT for SEZ customers.

Panel.headerText: What kind of information does an authorised user of application asked to provide?

Text.text: Basic information includes the name of the authorised person, contact details, and login email.

Panel.headerText: What default period is required to be selected?

Text.text: A: : You can select any period during registration as a default period. The default period is required only to create a personal experience for you while landing on the dashboard. The same can be modified from the profile section in your account.

Panel.headerText: Form submission and account activation/ re-activation:
Is there a Captcha verification process before you submit the form?

Text.text: Yes, you need to enter the displayed Captcha for the successful submission of the form.

Panel.headerText: What happens after I submit the registration form?

Text.text: After successfully submitting your application, an email will be sent to the Air India Admin for approval. Once approved, you will receive a welcome email containing a temporary password.

Panel.headerText: What happens if my registration application is rejected?

Text.text: Upon rejection of the application, an email will be sent to you with the reason for rejection. You may resubmit the form post providing the correct information.

Panel.headerText: How do I activate my account after registration?

Text.text: You can activate your account by entering the OTP received in the email within 2 minutes.

Panel.headerText: What if I miss the 2-minute time limit for entering the OTP?

Text.text: You can use the Re-send OTP option to receive a new OTP and activate your account within the specified time.

Panel.headerText: When will my account be blocked?

Text.text: Your account will be blocked in the following scenarios:
Incorrect input of password consecutively five times in a row.
Inactive for 90 continuous days

Panel.headerText: What should I do if the authorised person left my organisation?

Text.text: You can re-initiate the account as a sub-user and connect
for activation of your email id and de-activation of earlier one.

Panel.headerText: How do I log in to the GST.AI after activation?

Text.text: Log in using your Email ID and the system-generated password received via email.

Panel.headerText: Is the login process secure?

Text.text: Yes, it is an email-OTP-based login to enhance security. You can also use the "forgot password" option if needed.

Panel.headerText: E-commerce Operator:
I am an Agent; how should I confirm my IATA code for e-commerce operations?

Text.text: Please select the IATA codes earmarked for e-commerce operations so that auto GST information is available to you to facilitate TCS liability.

Panel.headerText: What if I'm an e-commerce operator without a TCS GSTIN?

Text.text: In such cases, you will be considered only as a B2B customer, and the TCS details section will not be enabled.
